lines.gurmukhi: 1 mMglw crn
lines.transliteration_english: Ikonkaar Satiguru Prasaadi ?

Shabad OS B.translation: One Onkaar,the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

lines.gurmukhi: nwrwiex inj rUpu Dir nwQw nwQ snwQ krwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Naaraain Nij Roopi Dhari Naadaa Naad Sanaad Karaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Narayan, the lord of the destitutes, assuming forms has established mastery over all.

lines.gurmukhi: nrpiq nrh nirMdu hY inrMkwir Awkwru bxwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Narapati Narah Narindu Hai Nirankaari Aakaaru Banaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: He is the formless king of all men and kings who created various forms.

lines.gurmukhi: krqw purK vKwxIAY kwrxu krxu ibrdu ibrdwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Karataa Purakhu Vakhaaneeai Kaaranu Karanu Biradu Biradaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: As is creator of all the causes He is true to His reputation.

lines.gurmukhi: dyvI dyv dyvwiD dyv AlK AByv n AlKu lKwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Dayvee Dayv Dayvaadhi Dayv Alakh Abhayv N Alakhu Lakhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Gods and goddesses also could not know the extent of that Lord, the imperceptible and beyond all mysteries.

lines.gurmukhi: siq rUpu siqnwmu kir siqgur nwnk dyau jpwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Sati Roopu Sati Naamu Kari Satigur Naanak Dayu Japaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The ture Guru Nanak Dev inspired people to remember the true name of the Lord whose form is truth.

lines.gurmukhi: Drmswl krqwr puru swDsMgiq scKMf vswieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Dharamasaal Karataar Puru Saadhasangati Sach Khandu Vasaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Founding dharamsala, the place for dharma, at Kartarpur, it was inhabited by the holy congregartion as the abode

lines.gurmukhi: vwihgurU gur sbdu suxwieAw ]1]
lines.transliteration_english: Vaahiguroo Gur Sabadu Sounaaiaa ?1?

Shabad OS B.translation: Word Wahiguru was imparted (by Guru Nanak) to the people.

lines.gurmukhi: 2 jgq gurU

Shabad OS B.translation: Guru of the world

lines.gurmukhi: inhcl nIau DrweIEnu swDsMgiq scKMf smyau
lines.transliteration_english: Nihachal Neeu Dharaaeeaonu Saadhasangati Sach Khand Samayu.

Shabad OS B.translation: The steadfast foundation of the abode of truth in the form of holy congregation was laid thoughtfully (by Guru Na-nak Dev)

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK pMQu clwieEnu suK swgru byAMqu Amyau
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Pandu Chalaaiaonu Soukh Saagaru Bayantu Amayu.

Shabad OS B.translation: And he promulgated gurmukh-panth (Sikhism) which is ocean of infinite pleasures.

lines.gurmukhi: sic sbid AwrwDIAY Agm Agocru AlK AByau
lines.transliteration_english: Sachi Sabadi Aaraadheeai Agam Agocharu Alakh Abhayu.

Shabad OS B.translation: There, true word is practised which is unapproachable, imperceptible and mystical.

lines.gurmukhi: chu vrnw aupdysdw iCA drsn siB syvk syau
lines.transliteration_english: Chahu Varanaan Oupadaysadaa Chhia Darasan Sabhi Sayvak Sayu.

Shabad OS B.translation: That abode of truth preaches to all the four varnas and all the six philosophies (of Indian origin) remain absorbed in its service.

lines.gurmukhi: imTw bolxu inv clxu gurmuiK Bwau Bgiq ArQyau
lines.transliteration_english: Mitdaa Bolanu Niv Chalanu Guramoukhi Bhaau Bhagati Aradayu.

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurmukhs (there) speak sweetly, move humbly and are seekers of devotion.

lines.gurmukhi: Awid purKu Awdysu hY AibnwsI Aiq ACl ACyau
lines.transliteration_english: Aadi Purakhu Aadaysu Hai Abinaasee Ati Achhal Achhayu.

Shabad OS B.translation: Salutations are due to that primal Lord who is undestructible, undeceivable and unending.

lines.gurmukhi: jgqu gurU guru nwnk dyau ]2]
lines.transliteration_english: Jagatu Guroo Guru Naanak Dayu ?2?

Shabad OS B.translation: Guru Nanak is the enlightener (Guru) of the entire world.

lines.gurmukhi: 3 s`cw pwqSwh

Shabad OS B.translation: The true emperor

lines.gurmukhi: siqgur scw pwiqswhu byprvwhu AQwhu shwbw
lines.transliteration_english: Satigur Sachaa Paatisaahu Bayparavaahu Adaahu Sahaabaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The true Guru is the carefree emperor, unfathomable and full of all qualities of a master.

lines.gurmukhi: nwau grIb invwju hY bymuhqwj n mohu muhwbw
lines.transliteration_english: Naau Gareeb Nivaaju Hai Baymuhataaj N Mohu Muhaabaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: His name is cherisher of the poor; neither He has attachment with any one nor He is dependent on anybody.

lines.gurmukhi: bysumwr inrMkwru hY AlK Apwru Alwh is\\\\wbw
lines.transliteration_english: Baysoumaar Nirankaaru Hai Alakh Apaaru Salaah Siaabaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Formless, infinite and impeceptible, He is having all the attributes which deseve eulogization

lines.gurmukhi: kwiemu dwiemu swihbI hwjru nwjru vyd ikqwbw
lines.transliteration_english: Kaaimu Daaimu Saahibee Haajaru Naajaru Vayd Kitaabaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The mastery of the true Guru is eternal because all the always present before Him (for His praises).

lines.gurmukhi: Agmu Afolu Aqolu hY qolxhwru n fMfI Cwbw
lines.transliteration_english: Agamu Adolu Atolu Hai Tolanahaaru N Dandee Chhaabaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The true Guru is beyond all measuses; He cannot be weighed on any scale.

lines.gurmukhi: ieku Ciq rwju kmwNvdw dusmxu dUqu n sor srwbw
lines.transliteration_english: Iku Chhati Raaju Kamaanvadaa Dousamanu Dootu N Sor Saraabaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Uniform is His kingdom wherein there is no enemy, no friend and no noisy clamour

lines.gurmukhi: Awdlu Adlu clwiedw jwlmu julmu n jor jrwbw
lines.transliteration_english: Aadalu Adalu Chalaaidaa Jaalamu Julamu N Jor Jaraabaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The true Guru is judicious; dispenses justice and in His kingdom no atrocity and tyranny is exacted.

lines.gurmukhi: jwhr pIr jgqu guru bwbw ]3]
lines.transliteration_english: Jaahar Peer Jagatu Guru Baabaa ?3?

Shabad OS B.translation: Such a grand Guru (Ndnak) is the manifest spiritual teacher of the whole world.

lines.gurmukhi: 4 s`cw pwqSwh

Shabad OS B.translation: The true emperor

lines.gurmukhi: gMg bnwrs ihMdUAw muslmwxwN mkw kwbw
lines.transliteration_english: Gang Banaaras Hindooaan Mousalamaanaan Makaa Kaabaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Hindus adore Ganges and Banaras and Muslims consider Mecca-Kaba as a holy place.But to the accompaniment of mradarig (drum) and rabad (stringed instrument) the praises (of Baba Nanak) are sung

lines.gurmukhi: Gir Gir bwbw gwvIAY vjin qwl miRdMgu rbwbw
lines.transliteration_english: Ghari Ghari Baabaa Gaaveeai Vajani Taal Mridangu Rabaabaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Lover of the devotees, he has come to uplift the down trodden ones.

lines.gurmukhi: Bgiq vClu hoie AwieAw piqq auDwrxu Ajbu Ajwbw
lines.transliteration_english: Bhagati Vachhalu Hoi Aaiaa Patit Udhaaranu Ajabu Ajaabaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: He himfelf is wonderful (because in spite of his powers he is egoless).

lines.gurmukhi: cwir vrn iek vrn hoie swDsMgiq imil hoie qrwbw
lines.transliteration_english: Chaari Varan Ik Varan Hoi Saadhasangati Mili Hoi Taraabaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: By his efforts all the four varnas have become one and now the individual gets liberated in the holy congregatio

lines.gurmukhi: cMdnu vwsu vxwspiq Avil dom n sym Krwbw
lines.transliteration_english: Chandanu Vaasu Vanaasapati Avali Dom N Saym Kharaabaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Like the fragrant of sandal, he without any discrimination makes every one fragrant.

lines.gurmukhi: hukmY AMdir sB ko kudriq iks dI krY jvwbw
lines.transliteration_english: Houkamai Andari Sabh Ko Kudarati Kis Dee Karai Javaabaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: All act as ordained by him and no one has the power to say no to him.

lines.gurmukhi: jwhr pIru jgqu gur bwbw ]4]
lines.transliteration_english: Jaahar Peeru Jagatu Gur Baabaa ?4?

Shabad OS B.translation: Such grand Guru (Nanak) is the manifest spiritual teacher of the whole world.

lines.gurmukhi: 5 gurU AMgd jI Awgmn

Shabad OS B.translation: Advent of Guru Angad

lines.gurmukhi: AMghu AMgu aupwieEn gMghu jwxu qrMg auTwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Angahu Angu Oupaaiaonu Gangahu Jaanu Tarangu Outdaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Guru Nanak created him ( Guru Angad) from his limbs as the waves are produced by Ganges out of itself.

lines.gurmukhi: gihr gMBIr ghIru guxu gurmuiK guru goibMdu sdwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Gahir Ganbheeru Gaheeru Gounu Guramoukhi Guru Gobindu Sadaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Embodied with deep and sublime attributes he (Angad) was known by gurmukhs as the form of the (imperceptible) supreme soul (paramatman).

lines.gurmukhi: duK suK dwqw dyixhwru duK suK smsir lypu nw lwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Doukh Soukh Daataa Daynihaaru Doukh Soukh Samasari Laypu N Laaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: He himself is bestower of pleasures and pains but remains always without any blot.

lines.gurmukhi: gur cylw cylw gurU guru cyly prcw prcwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Gur Chaylaa Chaylaa Guroo Guru Chaylay Parachaa Parachaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The love between the Guru and the disciple was such that the disciple became Guru and the Guru disciple.

lines.gurmukhi: ibrKhu Plu Pl qy ibrKu ipau puqhu puqu ipau pqIAwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Birakhahu Phalu Phal Tay Birakhu Piu Poutahu Poutu Piu Pateeaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: It happened in the same manner as tree creates fruit and from fruit is created tree, or as father becomes happy over son and son feels happy in obeying the orders of father.

lines.gurmukhi: pwrbHm pUrnu bHmu sbdu suriq ilv AlK lKwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Paarabrahamu Pooranu Brahamu Sabadu Surati Liv Alakh Lakhaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: His consiconsness merged into word and the perfect transcendental Brahm made him see the imperceptible (Lord).

lines.gurmukhi: bwbwxy gur AMgdu AwieAw ]5]
lines.transliteration_english: Baabaanay Gur Angad Aaiaa ?5?

Shabad OS B.translation: Now Guru Angad got established as ( the extended form of) Baba Nanak.

lines.gurmukhi: 6 gurU AMgd pRkwS

Shabad OS B.translation: Induction of Guru Angad

lines.gurmukhi: pwrsu hoAw pwrshu siqgur prcy siqgur khxw
lines.transliteration_english: Paarasu Hoaa Paarasahu Satigur Parachay Satiguru Kahanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Meeting paras (the philosopher's stone Guru Nanak) Guru Angad became paras himself and because of his love for the Guru he was called the true Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: cMdnu hoieAw cMdnhu gur aupdys rhiq ivic rhxw
lines.transliteration_english: Chandanu Hoiaa Chandanahu Gur Oupadays Rahat Vichi Rahanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Living according to the preachings and code of conduct laid down by the Guru, he became sandal by meeting the sandal (Guru Nanak).

lines.gurmukhi: joiq smwxI joiq ivic gurmiq suKu durmiq duK dhxw
lines.transliteration_english: Joti Samaanee Joti Vichi Guramati Soukhu Duramati Doukh Dahanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The light immersed in the light; the delight of the wisdom of Guru (gurmat) was attained and the sufferings of evil mindedness got burnt and wiped out.

lines.gurmukhi: Acrj no Acrju imlY ivsmwdY ivsmwdu smhxw
lines.transliteration_english: Acharaj No Acharaju Milai Visamaadai Visamaadu Samahanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The wonder met the wonder and becoming wondrous got imbued with the wonder (Guru Nanak).

lines.gurmukhi: Aipau pIAx inJru Jrxu Ajru jrxu AshIAxu shxw
lines.transliteration_english: Apiu Peean Nijharu Jharanu Ajaru Jaranu Asaheeanu Sahanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: After quaffing the nectar the fountain of joy emerges to flew and then the power of bearing the unbearable is obtained

lines.gurmukhi: scu smwxw scu ivic gwfI rwhu swDsMig vhxw
lines.transliteration_english: Sachu Samaanaa Sachu Vichi Gaadee Raahu Saadhasangi Vahanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Moving on the highway of the holy congregation, the truth has merged into the truth.

lines.gurmukhi: bwbwxY Gir cwnxu lhxw ]6]
lines.transliteration_english: Baabaanai Ghari Chaananu Lahanaa ?6?

Shabad OS B.translation: In fact Lahana became the light of Baba Nanak's house.

lines.gurmukhi: 7 gur AMgd spuqR

Shabad OS B.translation: The worthy son Guru Angad

lines.gurmukhi: sbdY sbdu imlwieAw gurmuiK AGVu GVwey ghxw
lines.transliteration_english: Sabadai Sabadu Milaaiaa Guramoukhi Agharhu Gharhaaay Gahanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Gurumukh (Angad) attuning his sabad (word) to the Sabad has chiselled his clumsy mind to make it an ornament.

lines.gurmukhi: Bwie Bgiq BY clxw Awpu gxwie n Klhlu Khxw
lines.transliteration_english: Bhaai Bhagati Bhai Chalanaa Aapu Ganaai N Khalahalu Khahanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: He has disciplined himself in the fear of loving devotion and losing the sense of ego has saved himself from all sorts of imbroglios.

lines.gurmukhi: dIn dunI dI swihbI gurmuiK gos nsInI bhxw
lines.transliteration_english: Deen Dounee Dee Saahibee Guramoukhi Gos Naseenee Bahanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Achieving mastery over spirituality as well as temporarily, the gurmukh has resided in the loneliness.

lines.gurmukhi: kwrx krx smrQ hY hoie AClu Cl AMdir Chxw
lines.transliteration_english: Kaaran Karan Samarad Hai Hoi Achhalu Chhal Andari Chhahanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Even being cause of all effects and all powerfull he remains in the world full of deceptions.

lines.gurmukhi: squ sMqoKu dieAw Drm ArQ vIcwir shij Gir Ghxw
lines.transliteration_english: Satu Santokhu Daiaa Dharam Arad Veechaari Sahaji Ghari Ghahanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Dopting truth, contentment, compassion dharma, richness and scriminatory wisdom(Vichar) he has made peace his abo

lines.gurmukhi: kwm kRoDu ivroDu Cif loB mohu AhMkwrhu qhxw
lines.transliteration_english: Kaam Krodhu Virodhu Chhadi Lobh Mohu Ahankaarahu Tahanaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Shedding lust, anger and opposition he has repudiated greed, infatuation and ego.

lines.gurmukhi: puqu spuqu bbwxy lhxw ]7]
lines.transliteration_english: Poutu Sapoutu Babaanay Lahanaa ?7?

Shabad OS B.translation: Such a worthy son Lahana (Angad) is born in the family of Baba (Nanak).

lines.gurmukhi: 8 gur AMgd spuqR

Shabad OS B.translation: Worthy son, Guru Angad

lines.gurmukhi: gur AMgdu guru AMgu qy AMmiRq ibrKu AMmiRq Pl PilAw
lines.transliteration_english: Guru Angad Guru Ang Tay Anmrit Birakhu Anmrit Phal Phaliaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: From the limb of Guru (Nanak) the tree of nector fruits in the name of Guru Angad has flourished.

lines.gurmukhi: joqI joiq jgweIAnu dIvy qy ijau dIvw bilAw
lines.transliteration_english: Jotee Joti Jagaaeeanu Deevay Tay Jiu Deevaa Baliaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: As a lamp lits another lamp, with the light (of Guru Nanak), the flame (of Guru Angad) has been lit.

lines.gurmukhi: hIrY hIrw byiDAw Clu kir AClI AClu CilAw
lines.transliteration_english: Heerai Heeraa Baydhiaa Chhalu Kari Achhulee Achhalu Chhaliaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The diamond has cut (to shape) the diamond as if through magic, the undeceivable (Baba Nanak) has brought under control the simple_minded one (Guru Angad)

lines.gurmukhi: koeI buiJ n hMGeI pwxI AMdir pwxI rilAw
lines.transliteration_english: Koi Bujhi N Hanghaee Paanee Andari Paanee Raliaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Now they connot be distinguished as if water has mingled with water.

lines.gurmukhi: scw scu suhwvVw scu AMdir scu schu FilAw
lines.transliteration_english: Sachaa Sachu Suhaavarhaa Sachu Andari Sachu Sachahu Dphaliaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The Truth is always beautiful and in the die of truth he (Guru Angad) has moulded himself.

lines.gurmukhi: inhclu scw qKqu hY Aibcl rwj n hlY hilAw
lines.transliteration_english: Nihachalu Sachaa Takhatu Hai Abichal Raaj N Halai Haliaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: His throne is immovable and kingdom everlasting ; they connot be moved in spite of efforts.

lines.gurmukhi: sc sbdu guir sauipAw sc tkswlhu iskw cilAw
lines.transliteration_english: Sach Sabadu Guri Saoupiaa Sach Takasaalahu Sikaa Chaliaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The ture word has been handed over ( to Guru Angad) by the Guru (Nanak) as if the coin has been issued from the mint

lines.gurmukhi: isD nwQ Avqwr sB hQ joiVkY hoey KilAw
lines.transliteration_english: Sidh Naad Avataar Sabh Had Jorhi Kai Hoay Khaliaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Now siddhs naths and incarnations (of gods) etc have stood before him with folded hands

lines.gurmukhi: scw hukmu su Atlu n tilAw ]8]
lines.transliteration_english: Sachaa Houkamu Su Atalu N Taliaa ?8?

Shabad OS B.translation: And this command is true,immutable and inevitable.

lines.gurmukhi: 9 gurU Amrdws

Shabad OS B.translation: Guru Amar Das

lines.gurmukhi: AClu ACydu ABydu hY Bgiq vCl hoie AClu ClwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Achhalu Achhaydu Abhaydu Hai Bhagati Vachhal Hoi Achhal Chhalaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The Lord is undeceivable, indestructible and non-dual, but because of His love for His devotees He is sometimes deluded by them (as in the case of 'Guru Amar Das).

lines.gurmukhi: mihmw imiq imrjwd lMiG primiq pwrwvwru n pwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Mahimaa Miti Mirajaad Laghi Paramiti Paaraavaaru N Paaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: His grandeur has crossed all the limits and being boyond all the boundaries none could know about his extent.

lines.gurmukhi: rhrwsI rhrwis hY pYrI pY jgu pYrI pwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Raharaasee Raharaasi Hai Pairee Pai Jagu Pairee Paaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Among all the codes of couduct, the code of conduct of the Guru is the best one; he falling at the feet of Guru (Angad) has made the whole world bow at his own feet.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suKPlu Amr pdu AMmiRq biRiK AMmiRq Pl lwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Amarapadu Anmrit Brikhi Anmrit Phal Laaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The pleasure fruit of the gurmuldts is the state of immortality and on the tree of nectar (Guru Angad) Guru Amar Das, the nectar fruit has grown.

lines.gurmukhi: gur cylw cylw gurU purKhu purK aupwie smwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Gur Chaylaa Chaylaa Guroo Purakhahu Purakh Oupaai Samaaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: From the Guru emerged the disciple and the disciple became the Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: vrqmwn vIih ivsvy hoie iekIh shij Gir AwieAw
lines.transliteration_english: Varatamaan Veehi Visavay Hoi Ikeeh Sahaji Ghari Aaiaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Guru Angad the Cosmic spirit ( Purakh) having manifested the supreme spirit, (Guru Amar Das), himself merged in the supreme light.

lines.gurmukhi: scw Amru Amir vrqwieAw ]9]
lines.transliteration_english: Sachaa Amaru Amari Varataaiaa ?9?

Shabad OS B.translation: Going beyond the perceptible world, he established himself in equipoise.Thus, Guru Amar Das has spead the true message.

lines.gurmukhi: 10 gurU Amrdws

Shabad OS B.translation: Amar Das,the Grandson of Guru Nanak

lines.gurmukhi: sbdu suriq prcwiekY cyly qy guru guru qy cylw
lines.transliteration_english: Sabadu Surati Parachaai Kai Chaylay Tay Guru Guru Tay Chaylaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Absorbing consciousness in the Word, the disciple became Guru and the Guru disciple.

lines.gurmukhi: vwxw qwxw AwKIAY sUqu ieku huie kpVu mylw
lines.transliteration_english: Vaanaa Taanaa Aakheeai Sootu Iku Hui Kaparhu Maylaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Ward and weft are separate names but in the form of yam they are one and are known as the one, cloth.

lines.gurmukhi: duDhu dhI vKwxIAY dhIAhu mKxu kwju suhylw
lines.transliteration_english: Dudhahu Dahee Vakhaaneeai Daheeahu Makhanu Kaaju Suhaylaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The same milk becomes curd and from curd is made butter to be used variously.

lines.gurmukhi: imsrI KMfu vKwxIAY jwxu kmwdhu rylw pylw
lines.transliteration_english: Misaree Khandu Vakhaaneeai Jaanu Kamaadahu Raylaa Paylaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: From the sugar cane juice are prepared the lump sugar and other forms of sugar.

lines.gurmukhi: KIir KMfu iGau myil kir Aiq ivsmwdu swd rs kylw
lines.transliteration_english: Kheeri Khandu Ghiu Mayli Kari Ati Visamaadu Saad Ras Kaylaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Mixing the milk, sugar, ghee etc. many dainty dishes are prepared.

lines.gurmukhi: pwn supwrI kQu imil cUny rMgu surMg suhylw
lines.transliteration_english: Paan Soupaaree Kadu Mili Choonay Rangu Surang Suhaylaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Likewise when betal, betel nut, catechu and lime are mixed, they produce a beautiful colour.

lines.gurmukhi: poqw prvwxIku nvylw ]10]
lines.transliteration_english: Potaa Paravaaneeku Navaylaa ?10?

Shabad OS B.translation: In the same way the grandson Guru Amar Das has been authentically established.

lines.gurmukhi: 11 gurU Amr dws

Shabad OS B.translation: Guru Amar Das

lines.gurmukhi: iqil imil Pul Amul ijau gurisK sMiD sugMD Pulylw
lines.transliteration_english: Tili Mili Phul Amul Jiu Gurasikh Sandhi Sougandh Phulaylaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: As sesame mixed with flower becomes scented oil, likewise the, meeting of the Guru and the disciple makes a new personality.

lines.gurmukhi: Kwsw mlmil isrIswPu swh kpwh clq bhu Kylw
lines.transliteration_english: Khaasaa Malamali Sireesaadhu Saah Kapaah Chalat Bahu Khaylaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Cotten also after passing ugh many processes becomes cloth of different varieties (similarly the ciple after meeting the Gum obtains a high position) .

lines.gurmukhi: gur mUriq guru sbdu hY swDsMgiq imil AMmiRq vylw
lines.transliteration_english: Gur Moorati Gur Sabadu Hai Saadhasangati Mili Anmrit Vaylaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Only the Guru's rd is the idol of Guru and this word is received in the holy congregation e ambrosial hours of the day.

lines.gurmukhi: dunIAw kUVI swihbI sc mxI sc grib ghylw
lines.transliteration_english: Douneeaa Koorhee Saahibee Sach Manee Sach Garabi Gahaylaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: The lordship of the world is false and truth must be caught hold of proudly.

lines.gurmukhi: dyvI dyv duVwieAnu ijau imrgwvil dyiK bGylw
lines.transliteration_english: Dayvee Dayv Durhaaianu Jiu Miragaavali Daykhi Baghaylaa.

Shabad OS B.translation: Before such a truthful person, gods and goddesses run as a group of deer take to their heels on seeing a tiger

Shabad OS B.translation: Those frolicsome persons who toil on the name of the Lord with devotion and love become peaceful and tranquil. Those who are filled with dross become neat and clean.
